title: scilus/nf-tractoflow pipeline parameters
description: Human diffusion MRI processing and tractography

input_output_options.title: Input/output options
input_output_options.description: Define where the pipeline should find input data and save output data.
input_output_options.help_text: Specify input samplesheet and output directory

input.description: Path to comma-separated file containing information about the input subjects files.
input.help_text: List of subjects to process. See `assets/samplesheet_raw.csv`.

bids.description: Path to comma-separated file containing information about the input bids databases.
bids.help_text: List of BIDS databases to load. See `assets/samplesheet_bids.csv`.

bids_config.description: BIDS configuration file in json pre-generated by TractoFlow(Read_BIDS process). This option must be used only if --bids did not work due to an issue in the BIDS folder.
bids_config.help_text: BIDS configuration file in json pre-generated by TractoFlow(Read_BIDS process). This option must be used only if --bids did not work due to an issue in the BIDS folder.

bidsignore.description: If you want to ignore some subjects or some files, you can provide an extra bidsignore file. Check: https://github.com/bids-standard/bids-validator#bidsignore
bidsignore.help_text: If you want to ignore some subjects or some files, you can provide an extra bidsignore file. Check: https://github.com/bids-standard/bids-validator#bidsignore

clean_bids.description: If set, it will remove all the participants that are missing any information.
clean_bids.help_text: If set, it will remove all the participants that are missing any information.

b0_thr_extract_b0.description: Consider all b-values below threshold as b=0 images.
b0_thr_extract_b0.help_text: Consider all b-values below threshold as b=0 images.

dwi_shell_tolerance.description: Consider all b-values up to +-tolerance as belonging to the same shell.
dwi_shell_tolerance.help_text: Consider all b-values up to +-tolerance as belonging to the same shell.

outdir.description: The output directory where the results will be saved. You have to use absolute paths to storage on Cloud infrastructure.
outdir.help_text: The output directory where the results will be saved. You have to use absolute paths to storage on Cloud infrastructure.

email.help_text: Set this parameter to your e-mail address to get a summary e-mail with details of the run sent to you when the workflow exits. If set in your user config file (`~/.nextflow/config`) then you don't need to specify this on the command line for every run.

multiqc_title.description: MultiQC report title. Printed as page header, used for filename if not otherwise specified.
multiqc_title.help_text: MultiQC report title. Printed as page header, used for filename if not otherwise specified.

dwi_preprocessing_options.title: DWI preprocessing options
dwi_preprocessing_options.description: All parameters related to DWI preprocessing.

bet_prelim_f.description: Fractional Intensity threshold for preliminary brain masking.
bet_prelim_f.help_text: Fractional Intensity threshold for preliminary brain masking.

dilate_b0_mask_prelim_brain_extraction.description: Dilation radius applied to the preliminary mask to ensure whole brain coverage.
dilate_b0_mask_prelim_brain_extraction.help_text: Dilation radius applied to the preliminary mask to ensure whole brain coverage.

extent.description: Denoising block size. Rule: extent^3 >= number of directions.
extent.help_text: Denoising block size. Rule: extent^3 >= number of directions.

encoding_direction.description: Encoding direction of the DWI [x, y, z]
encoding_direction.help_text: Encoding direction of the DWI [x, y, z]

config_topup.description: Configuration file to use for Topup. Can either be a full path to a file or the name of a configuration file in Topup resources.

prefix_topup.description: Output prefix to use for susceptibility filtering output filenames.

eddy_cmd.description: Command to use to run Eddy.
eddy_cmd.help_text: Command to use to run Eddy.

bet_topup_before_eddy_f.description: Fractional Intensity threshold for intermediate brain masking on Topup corrected b0 images.
bet_topup_before_eddy_f.help_text: Fractional Intensity threshold for intermediate brain masking on Topup corrected b0 images.

use_slice_drop_correction.description: If set, will use the slice drop correction option from Eddy.
use_slice_drop_correction.help_text: If set, will use the slice drop correction option from Eddy.

bet_dwi_final_f.description: Fractional Intensity threshold for final brain masking.
bet_dwi_final_f.help_text: Fractional Intensity threshold for final brain masking.

fa_mask_threshold.description: FA threshold to compute WM mask for normalization.
fa_mask_threshold.help_text: FA threshold to compute WM mask for normalization.

t1_preprocessing_options.title: T1 preprocessing options
t1_preprocessing_options.description: All parameters related to T1 preprocessing.

template_t1.description: Path to the template for antsBrainExtraction. The folder must contain t1_template.nii.gz and t1_brain_probability_map.nii.gz. The default path is the human_data folder in the singularity container
template_t1.help_text: Path to the template for antsBrainExtraction. The folder must contain t1_template.nii.gz and t1_brain_probability_map.nii.gz. The default path is the human_data folder in the singularity container

resampling_options.title: Resampling options
resampling_options.description: Resampling options for DWI and anatomical volumes.

dwi_processing_options.title: DWI processing options
dwi_processing_options.description: All parameters related to DWI processing (SH, DTI, fODF).

max_dti_shell_value.description: Maximum shell threshold to be consider as a DTI shell. This is the default behavior to select DTI shells.
max_dti_shell_value.help_text: Maximum shell threshold to be consider as a DTI shell. This is the default behavior to select DTI shells.

dti_shells.description: Shells selected to compute the DTI metrics (generally b <= 1200). Please write them between quotes e.g. (--dti_shells "0 300 1000"). If selected, it will overwrite max_dti_shell_value.
dti_shells.help_text: Shells selected to compute the DTI metrics (generally b <= 1200). Please write them between quotes e.g. (--dti_shells "0 300 1000"). If selected, it will overwrite max_dti_shell_value.

min_fodf_shell_value.description: Minimum shell threshold to be consider as a fODF shell. This is the default behaviour to select fODF shells.
min_fodf_shell_value.help_text: Minimum shell threshold to be consider as a fODF shell. This is the default behaviour to select fODF shells.

fodf_shells.description: Shells selected to compute the fODF metrics (generally b >= 700). Please write them between quotes e.g. (--fodf_shells "0 1000 2000"). If selected, it will overwrite min_fodf_shell_value.
fodf_shells.help_text: Shells selected to compute the fODF metrics (generally b >= 700). Please write them between quotes e.g. (--fodf_shells "0 1000 2000"). If selected, it will overwrite min_fodf_shell_value.

fa.description: Initial FA threshold to compute the frf.
fa.help_text: Initial FA threshold to compute the frf.

min_fa.description: Minimum FA threshold to compute the frf.
min_fa.help_text: Minimum FA threshold to compute the frf.

min_nvox.description: Minimum number of voxels to compute the frf.
min_nvox.help_text: Minimum number of voxels to compute the frf.

roi_radius.description: Region of interest radius to compute the frf.
roi_radius.help_text: Region of interest radius to compute the frf.

manual_frf.description: Force a fiber response function. Supply as 3 values : --manual_frf "mean_b0 parallel_diff perpendicular_diff".
manual_frf.help_text: Force a fiber response function. Supply as 3 values : --manual_frf "mean_b0 parallel_diff perpendicular_diff".

mean_frf.description: Average the frf of all subjects. USE ONLY IF ALL OF SUBJECTS COME FROM THE SAME SCANNER AND ADHERE TO THE SAME ACQUISITION PROTOCOL.
mean_frf.help_text: Average the frf of all subjects. USE ONLY IF ALL OF SUBJECTS COME FROM THE SAME SCANNER AND ADHERE TO THE SAME ACQUISITION PROTOCOL.

sh_order.description: Spherical harmonics order, must be even. Rules : sh_order=8 for 45 directions, sh_order=6 for 28 directions.
sh_order.help_text: Spherical harmonics order, must be even. Rules : sh_order=8 for 45 directions, sh_order=6 for 28 directions.

fodf_metrics_a_factor.description: Multiplicative factor for AFD max in ventricles.
fodf_metrics_a_factor.help_text: Multiplicative factor for AFD max in ventricles.

relative_threshold.description: Relative threshold on fODF amplitude in ]0,1].
relative_threshold.help_text: Relative threshold on fODF amplitude in ]0,1].

max_fa_in_ventricle.description: Maximal threshold of FA to be considered as ventricles voxels.
max_fa_in_ventricle.help_text: Maximal threshold of FA to be considered as ventricles voxels.

min_md_in_ventricle.description: Minimal threshold of MD in mm2/s to be considered as ventricles voxels.
min_md_in_ventricle.help_text: Minimal threshold of MD in mm2/s to be considered as ventricles voxels.

sh_fitting.description: Compute a Spherical Harmonics fit on the DWI, and output the SH coefficients in a Nifti file.
sh_fitting.help_text: Compute a Spherical Harmonics fit on the DWI, and output the SH coefficients in a Nifti file.

sh_fitting_basis.description: SH basis used for the optional SH fitting.
sh_fitting_basis.help_text: SH basis used for the optional SH fitting.

sh_fitting_order.description: SH order used for the optional SH fitting, must be an even number. Rules : sh_order=8 for 45 directions, sh_order=6 for 28 directions
sh_fitting_order.help_text: SH order used for the optional SH fitting, must be an even number. Rules : sh_order=8 for 45 directions, sh_order=6 for 28 directions

sh_fitting_shells.description: Shells selected to compute the SH fitting. Please write them between quotes e.g. (--sh_fitting_shells "0 1000"). NOTE: SH fitting works only on single shell. You must include the b0 shell as well.
sh_fitting_shells.help_text: Shells selected to compute the SH fitting. Please write them between quotes e.g. (--sh_fitting_shells "0 1000"). NOTE: SH fitting works only on single shell. You must include the b0 shell as well.

institutional_config_options.title: Institutional config options
institutional_config_options.description: Parameters used to describe centralised config profiles. These should not be edited.
institutional_config_options.help_text: The centralised nf-core configuration profiles use a handful of pipeline parameters to describe themselves. This information is then printed to the Nextflow log when you run a pipeline. You should not need to change these values when you run a pipeline.

custom_config_version.description: Git commit id for Institutional configs.

custom_config_base.help_text: If you're running offline, Nextflow will not be able to fetch the institutional config files from the internet. If you don't need them, then this is not a problem. If you do need them, you should download the files from the repo and tell Nextflow where to find them with this parameter.

generic_options.title: Generic options
generic_options.description: Less common options for the pipeline, typically set in a config file.
generic_options.help_text:
These options are common to all nf-core pipelines and allow you to customise some of the core preferences for how the pipeline runs.

Typically these options would be set in a Nextflow config file loaded for all pipeline runs, such as `~/.nextflow/config`.

publish_dir_mode.description: Method used to save pipeline results to output directory.
publish_dir_mode.help_text: The Nextflow `publishDir` option specifies which intermediate files should be saved to the output directory. This option tells the pipeline what method should be used to move these files. See [Nextflow docs](https://www.nextflow.io/docs/latest/process.html#publishdir) for details.

email_on_fail.description: Email address for completion summary, only when pipeline fails.
email_on_fail.help_text: An email address to send a summary email to when the pipeline is completed - ONLY sent if the pipeline does not exit successfully.

plaintext_email.description: Send plain-text email instead of HTML.

max_multiqc_email_size.description: File size limit when attaching MultiQC reports to summary emails.

monochrome_logs.description: Do not use coloured log outputs.

multiqc_config.description: Custom config file to supply to MultiQC.

multiqc_logo.description: Custom logo file to supply to MultiQC. File name must also be set in the MultiQC config file

multiqc_methods_description.description: Custom MultiQC yaml file containing HTML including a methods description.

validate_params.description: Boolean whether to validate parameters against the schema at runtime

pipelines_testdata_base_path.description: Base URL or local path to location of pipeline test dataset files

trace_report_suffix.description: Suffix to add to the trace report filename. Default is the date and time in the format yyyy-MM-dd_HH-mm-ss.
